name: @soundworks/service-scripting
description: soundworks service dedicated at managing user defined scripts

scripts.clean: rm -Rf client && rm -Rf server && rm -Rf common
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run transpile
scripts.version: npm run clean && npm run transpile && npm run doc && git add docs
scripts.transpile: npm run transpile:server && npm run transpile:client && npm run transpile:common
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run transpile && concurrently "npm run watch:client" "npm run watch:server" "npm run watch:common"
